Name: COMMODITIES
EIF: provisionally on 22 February 1994, in accordance with article 56. This Agreement was extended, in whole, until 30 September 2001 and 30 September 2003, respectively, by International Cocoa Council decisions taken at its fifty-eighth regular, and twenty-third special sessions held in London from 3 to 9 September 1998, and 9 to 10 July 2001. The Agreement was terminated and replaced on 1 October 2003 in accordance with its provisions.
